loki.title: Specify the Loki API Configuration
loki.description: The Loki API configuration is used to query for log data.

grafana.title: Specify the Grafana API Configuration
grafana.description: The Grafana API configuration is used to retrieve datasources to generate loki url in notifications.

notifiers.title: Specify the notifiers configurations
notifiers.description: Each notifier has its own configuration

notifier.description: Represents the notifier library to execute notif

extends.title: Specify the configuration to extend
extends.description: The path to the configuration to extend that can have either rules & templates.

missingLabelStrategy.title: Defines the behavior when a label value is missing. It's important to note that the label must exists in any case, this setting only defines the behavior when the value is missing.
missingLabelStrategy.description: Default to 'ignore'. The rule will be skipped.

defaultSeverity.title: The default severity of the alerts
defaultSeverity.description:
There are 4 levels of severity:
- Sev1: Critical. Possible values: 'critical'.
- Sev2: Error. Possible values: 'error', 'major'.
- Sev3: Warning. Possible values: 'warning', 'minor'.
- Sev4: Information. Possible values: 'information' | 'info' | 'low'. If not specified, the default value is 'error'.

selfMonitoring.title: Defines the behavior of the self monitoring

template.title: The template used to send the alert
template.description:
Can be a string or an object.
If it's a string, it must be a reference to a root template key.
If it's an object, it will be used as the template itself.

notifiers.title: The notifiers used to send the alert
notifiers.description:
An array of notifier names. Theses notifiers must be installed.
Sigyn notifiers can be unscopped (e.g. 'discord') or scopped (e.g. '@sigyn/discord').
If not specified, default to each notifiers configured.

errorFilters.title: Defines filters to errors to handle
errorFilters.description: Can be a list of string or RegExp

ruleFilters.title: Defines filters to rules to handle
ruleFilters.description: Can be a list of string or RegExp

minimumErrorCount.title: Defines the minimum number of errors to send an alert

throttle.title: Defines the self-monitoring alerts throttle
throttle.description: Can be useful to avoid spam

count.title: The number of error to unlock the interval, default to 0

interval.title: The interval of time to pause alert

activationThreshold.title: The number of alert before activating the throttle

name.title: The name of the composite rule

filters.title: Defines the filters to apply to the rules

include.title: Defines the rule to be included
include.description: A list of rule name, glob supported

exclude.title: Defines the rule to be excluded

severity.title: Defines the severity to be included

notifCount.title: The count of notifications sent by the rules to trigger alert

ruleCountThreshold.title: The number of rule that must have trigger an alert

interval.title: Defines the maximum interval, default one day
